text_block_list.text: On a holiday, I was taking a walk at the park when a voice called out to me.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Oh, Trainer-san.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Bumping in to you here is quite a coincidence, isn't it?～

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Just wandering here and there aimlessly……you could call it a walk. I tend to spend most of my days off like this, you know?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: My friends often tell me that I'm wasting a lot of time but, since I came from America, just walking and seeing the scenery is fulfilling.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Besides, even if it's a day off, I still want to move my body even just a little bit.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: While I'm moving my body, I can enjoy the atmosphere of this country…… you could say walking is a form of entertainment for me, you know?～

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: But well, I've already seen all around this area, so I'm not sure where I should go next time.
choice_data_list: I could act as your guide

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Eh, to a place for a walk? I see, that's a good idea～

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Maybe Trainer-san knows some scenery that I've never seen before, after all.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Fufu, in that case, I'll take you up on that offer. Let's take a leisurely stroll together!
So I chose a few places that Grass Wonder might not have known about.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: To think there was a teahouse here. I never knew～.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Even with all these fancy shops lined up, they haven't forgotten to give it a well balanced feel.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Oh, they've even created such a large menu using my favorite matcha♪

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: ……But, it might have been a mistake learning about this place. The temptation of sweets…… hmmmmm～……
And like that, I visited several places together with Grass Wonder―

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: A nice, quiet walk is good, but a fun walk like this is good too, isn't it? It's the result of walking together.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, where should we go next??
When Grass Wonder asked, I looked around. The Game Center caught my eye.
choice_data_list: Want to see the Game Center?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: The Game Center, is it……? Hmmmmm～, I'm not too familiar with places like that……

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: When it comes to walks, I can't help but think that a leisurely stroll is more suited for a quieter place……

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: A new discovery……

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: That's true, every place we've seen up until now had several new discoveries to be made as well.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: ……I understand. It's not often I get to take a walk with Trainer-san, so let's go take a look.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: As I thought, it's quite lively, isn't it～?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, what kind of game is this?
The game that Grass Wonder was curious about was a dance game.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: So it's a game you play by stepping on these buttons, it kind of seems a little bit like a Winning Live, doesn't it?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Eh? You mean…… me?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Hmmmm～…… well, I've done some dance training, so I should be able to play it……

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Understood, I'll give it a try. Don't laugh if I'm not very good at it, okay?
And so, Grass Wonder started the game……

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Hmm…… oh…… Ah, ah……!?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: ……It didn't go anything like a Winning Live.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Ah, but it was an interesting game. It's also a good work out.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: So there are games like this, huh～? I learned about a lot of things today.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: This was also because we took a walk together. Trainer-san, thank you very much for accompanying me.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: When our schedules allow for it, let's take more walks together♪

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Well then, I'll give it one more try……
choice_data_list: Because it's a good work out, right?
Because it's a good work out, right?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: 『To empathize is to know』…… to be able to understand without exchanging words, I'm in awe of your perceptiveness, Trainer-san.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Next I'll clear it, so just watch me.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Hmmmm～…… it's not going very well is it……?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Oh, are you seriously asking that? I haven't excercised enough yet, you know?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: And with that, I'll play another round, okay? This is for excercise, after all～.
And so, the walk with Grass Wonder continued until she felt she could play the game well.
